zh_CN: 你看过《银魂》吗？那是我从夏树那借来的漫画，真的非常有意思！我最喜欢的角色是-“银时”！
en: Have you ever seen Gintama? It's a manga I borrowed from Natsuki, and it's really interesting! My favorite character is Gin-san!

zh_CN: 虽然平时吊儿郎当，但一到关键时刻，就能给人带来满满地安全感！
en: Although he usually acts all carefree and lazy, when the crucial moment comes, he always brings a sense of security!
